title: Home Server
description: A fully responsive e-commerce platform with shopping cart and payment integration.
longDescription: This e-commerce website was built from the ground up with user experience in mind. It features product filtering, search functionality, user accounts, shopping cart persistence, and secure payment processing. The admin panel allows for easy product and inventory management.

title: Task Management App
description: A productivity application to manage tasks, deadlines and team collaboration.
longDescription: This task management application helps teams stay organized and meet deadlines efficiently. Users can create projects, assign tasks to team members, set deadlines, track progress, and receive notifications for upcoming or overdue tasks.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Real-time weather application with forecast data and location services.
longDescription: A comprehensive weather application that displays current conditions and forecasts for any location worldwide. The app uses geolocation services to provide local weather by default and allows users to search for weather information in any city.

title: Social Media Platform
description: A social networking application with profiles, posts, and real-time chat.
longDescription: This social media platform enables users to connect, share content, and communicate in real-time. Features include customizable user profiles, media sharing, post interactions (likes, comments, shares), and private messaging.
features: Post creation with image and video support

title: Recipe Finder App
description: A culinary application to discover and save recipes based on available ingredients.
longDescription: The Recipe Finder helps users discover meals they can cook with ingredients they already have. Users can search by ingredient, dietary restrictions, cuisine type, or meal category. The app also provides nutritional information and allows users to save favorite recipes.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A workout tracking application to monitor fitness progress and set goals.
longDescription: This fitness tracking application helps users monitor their physical activity, set fitness goals, and track their progress over time. Features include workout planning, exercise tracking, goal setting, and progress visualization with charts and statistics.
